editorialNotes.short: Book your ride and know exactly how much it’ll cost.

editorialNotes.standard: Airbnb has totally changed the way we find places to stay. The unique service is packed with amazing spots all around the world—from cottages in France to New York City condos. Book private rooms, share homes with a host, or list your own space. This full-featured app boasts thousands of rent-ready pads, intuitive filters, and a beautiful design.
editorialNotes.short: Book a place to stay for your dream get-away.
Find vacation homes around the world and more.
Reserve your flights and fly through the check-in line.

Travelling on a whim can be affordable with these irresistible deals.

editorialNotes.standard: In search of a dog walker or pet sitter? Rover connects you with trustworthy sitters who give your animals the care they deserve. We’ve used the app to find locals to watch our cat while we’re away and walk our dogs when we can’t. We’d say it’s doggone amazing.

ios.subtitle: Ride for less, drive for more!

editorialNotes.tagline: Book when prices are at their lowest
editorialNotes.standard: Next to losing our luggage or someone crushing our knees with a reclined seat, our biggest source of travel anxiety is paying too much for a flight. Simply enter a destination into Hopper, and the app quickly scours the Internet for the best deals, giving you an easy-to-understand snapshot of fares, ideal travel dates, and even when prices for your flight are likely to rise and fall. You might end up saving enough money for a knee-pleasing seat upgrade.
editorialNotes.short:
Once you know your destination,
let’s book your flight.

editorialNotes.standard: No more frantic inbox searches before leaving for the airport. No more desperate bag-rustling at the departure gate. This app puts every piece of our essential information (outside reminding us to pack a toothbrush) in one beautifully clean place. Pro tip: adding the widget to your Notification Center serves up details on your flight number, departure time and flight status.

We wouldn’t dream of planning a vacation without consulting TripAdvisor’s appraisals of hotels, restaurants, and attractions. But this robust app does much more than that, letting you book your entire trip—from flights to museum tickets—in one place. For those who embrace spontaneity, TripAdvisor is great for quickly finding spots nearby to stay, eat, or play, and the honest user reviews frequently save us from travel troubles.
editorialNotes.short: Read reviews from fellow travellers and book your entire trip.

editorialNotes.standard: Beautifully designed and powerful to use, Flighty is a first-class flight tracker for those on the move. The app offers detailed flight maps, live tracking, and delay forecasting — but the real magic is the perfectly timed notifications that keep you up to date and stress-free.
